TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OracleClientFactory extends System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory
Public NotInheritable Class OracleClientFactory Inherits DbProviderFactory
public ref class OracleClientFactory sealed : System::Data::Common::DbProviderFactory

summary.span: Representa um conjunto de métodos para criar instâncias de implementação de classes de fonte de dados do provedor Oracle.

span.span: Represents a set of methods for creating instances of the Oracle provider's implementation of the data source classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esse tipo foi substituído e será removido em uma versão futura do .NET Framework.This type is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the .NET Framework. Para obter mais informações, consulte [Oracle e ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/oracle-and-adonet.md).For more information, see [Oracle and ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/oracle-and-adonet.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.Common.DbCommand CreateCommand() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreateCommand () As DbCommand

returns.span: Uma nova instância fortemente tipada de .

span.span: A new strongly typed instance of .

remarks.format: ## Examples O fragmento de código a seguir retorna um fortemente tipada instância.The following code fragment returns a strongly typed instance. ```vb Dim newFactory As OracleClientFactory = OracleClientFactory.Instance Dim command As DbCommand = newFactory.CreateCommand() ``` ```csharp OracleClientFactory newFactory = OracleClientFactory.Instance; DbCommand command = newFactory.CreateCommand(); ```

summary.span: Obtém uma instância do , que pode ser usada para recuperar objetos de dados fortemente tipados.

span.span: Gets an instance of the , which can be used to retrieve strongly typed data objects.

remarks.format: ## Examples O fragmento de código a seguir usa o campo a recuperar um de instância e, em seguida, retornar um fortemente tipada instância.The following code fragment uses the field to retrieve an instance and then return a strongly typed instance. ```vb Dim newFactory As OracleClientFactory = OracleClientFactory.Instance Dim command As DbCommand = newFactory.CreateCommand() ``` ```csharp OracleClientFactory newFactory = OracleClientFactory.Instance; DbCommand command = newFactory.CreateCommand(); ```
